I am a PhD year 3 student in the Computer Science and Engineering department at The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (HKUST), supervised by Prof. Xiaojuan Ma. Previously, I obtained my undergraduate degree of Computer Science and Technology from Tsinghua University.

As I write in my slogan, I care about people. Therefore, my research is driven by the question of how additional technological support can empower the interactions people already have with the world as complementaries, rather than replace them. So far, my work has examined humanâ€“environment and humanâ€“human interaction; next, I hope to deepen my focus on humanâ€“self interaction, particularly through embodied and physical interfaces such as robots and interactive objects.

Apart from research, I am also a huge fan of music, dance and kpop. I make acapella music and dance covers. FYI, my kpop bias is GOT7, DAY6, and Xdinary Heroes. I also learnt to tell fortune with tarot cards, you can catch up with me for a tarot reading session if you are interested!
